text: Novoallaberdino () is a rural locality (a village) in Muraptalovsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 19 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 45 km from Yermolayevo, 11 km from Novomuraptalovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Novoallaberdino
